result.arabic_text: إِنَّ فِرۡعَوۡنَ عَلَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَجَعَلَ أَهۡلَهَا شِيَعٗا يَسۡتَضۡعِفُ طَآئِفَةٗ مِّنۡهُمۡ يُذَبِّحُ أَبۡنَآءَهُمۡ وَيَسۡتَحۡيِۦ نِسَآءَهُمۡۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ
result.translation: 4. Diggah firqawni masri baaxoh bagul caddok tatreeh Yalla kinniyo iyye, kaadu masri mara qaxa-qaxa ken abeeh ken baxaabaxseh horta keenik yussuqunxeeh xixxibiseh, (israa-iil xaylo kinnuk) lab xaylo keenik yasguudeeh, agabu keenik nuwwuk cabaah naqoosah ken haysita, diggah usuk baaxó baysa marih numû suge.
